languages.text: {n}В голове нарастает неприятная тяжесть, будто на вашем разуме медленно сжимаются тиски. Хормейстер стоит на коленях, вглядываясь в пустоту выжженными глазами. Он поднимает голову, и вы видите изможденного старика, слабого и напуганного. Он шепчет:{/n} "Она здесь. Аделина вернулась. Она просит у меня о помощи. Но вас... Вас она боится. Прячется. Вы ведь не причините ей вреда?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хормейстер стоит на коленях, вглядываясь в пустоту перед собой. В этот раз привычное ощущение потустороннего взгляда не касается вас. Вместо этого, с момента, как вы ступили в капеллу, в голове нарастала неприятная тяжесть, будто на вашем разуме медленно сжимаются тиски, достигая своего апогея, когда вы вступили в контакт с хормейстером.{/n} "...невозможно. Я видел собственными глазами как... Ваша светлость".

languages.text: {n}An unpleasant heaviness grows in your head, as if a vice were slowly tightening its grip on your mind. The Choirmaster is kneeling, his burnt-out eyes peering into the void. He raises his head, and you see a weary old man, weak and frightened. He whispers,{/n} "She is here. Adeline has returned. She is asking me for help. But you... You scare her. She is hiding from you. You will not harm her, will you?"
languages.original_text: {n}В голове нарастает неприятная тяжесть, будто на вашем разуме медленно сжимаются тиски. Хормейстер стоит на коленях, вглядываясь в пустоту выжженными глазами. languages.text: {n}Una pesadez desagradable se extiende por tu cabeza, como si unas tenazas estuvieran apretando cada vez más tu mente. El maestro del Coro está arrodillado y sus ojos calcinados permanecen fijos en el vacío. Levanta la cabeza y ves a un hombre anciano, cansado, débil y asustado. Susurra:{/n} «Está aquí. Adeline ha vuelto. Me está pidiendo ayuda. Pero usted... la asusta. Se esconde de usted. No le hará daño, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}An unpleasant heaviness grows in your head, as if a vice were slowly tightening its grip on your mind. The Choirmaster is kneeling, his burnt-out eyes peering into the void. He raises his head, and you see a weary old man, weak and frightened. He whispers,{/n} "She is here. Adeline has returned. She is asking me for help. But you... You scare her. She is hiding from you. You will not harm her, will you?"

El maestro del Coro está arrodillado y sus ojos calcinados permanecen fijos en el vacío. Levanta la cabeza y ves a un hombre anciano, cansado, débil y asustado. Susurra:{/n} «Está aquí. Adeline ha vuelto. Me está pidiendo ayuda. Pero usted... la asusta. Se esconde de usted. No le hará daño, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: {n}頭の中の嫌な気だるさは強くなり、まるで徐々にぎゅっと心を締め上げられるかのようだ。クワイアーマスターは、焼け焦げた目でヴォイドを覗き込んでいる。男が顔を上げると、疲れ果てた老人の弱々しく怯える姿がそこにあった。男はボソボソと言葉を吐く。{/n}「彼女はここにいる。アデリーンが戻った。私に助けを求めているんだ。だが彼女は…あなたに怯えている。あなたから身を隠している。彼女を傷つけることはしないでくれ、頼む」
languages.original_text: {n}An unpleasant heaviness grows in your head, as if a vice were slowly tightening its grip on your mind. The Choirmaster is kneeling, his burnt-out eyes peering into the void. He raises his head, and you see a weary old man, weak and frightened. He whispers,{/n} "She is here. Adeline has returned. She is asking me for help. But you... You scare her. She is hiding from you. You will not harm her, will you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}頭の中の嫌な気だるさは強くなり、まるで徐々にぎゅっと心を締め上げられるかのようだ。クワイアーマスターは、焼け焦げた目でヴォイドを覗き込んでいる。男が顔を上げると、疲れ果てた老人の弱々しく怯える姿がそこにあった。男はボソボソと言葉を吐く。{/n}「彼女はここにいる。アデリーンが戻った。私に助けを求めているんだ。だが彼女は…あなたに怯えている。あなたから身を隠している。彼女を傷つけることはしないでくれ、頼む」

languages.text: {n}某种令人不悦的沉重感在你的意识中滋长，仿佛老虎钳一样慢慢攫住你的脑子。唱诗大师正跪在地上，被烧穿的双眼凝视着虚空。当他抬起头的时候，看起来就像个疲态尽显的老人一样，满心恐惧、虚弱不堪。他低声开了口。{/n}“她就在这里，艾德琳回来了。她想让我帮她，但您……您吓到她了，她在躲着您。您该不会伤害她吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}An unpleasant heaviness grows in your head, as if a vice were slowly tightening its grip on your mind. The Choirmaster is kneeling, his burnt-out eyes peering into the void. He raises his head, and you see a weary old man, weak and frightened. He whispers,{/n} "She is here. Adeline has returned. She is asking me for help. But you... You scare her. She is hiding from you. You will not harm her, will you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}某种令人不悦的沉重感在你的意识中滋长，仿佛老虎钳一样慢慢攫住你的脑子。唱诗大师正跪在地上，被烧穿的双眼凝视着虚空。当他抬起头的时候，看起来就像个疲态尽显的老人一样，满心恐惧、虚弱不堪。他低声开了口。{/n}“她就在这里，艾德琳回来了。她想让我帮她，但您……您吓到她了，她在躲着您。您该不会伤害她吧？”

languages.text: {n}Eine unangenehme Schwere wächst in deinem Kopf heran, als würde dein Verstand in einem Schraubstock stecken, der langsam immer fester zugedreht wird. Der Chormeister kniet auf dem Boden. Seine ausgebrannten Augen blicken in die Leere. Er hebt den Kopf, und du siehst einen erschöpften alten Mann, geschwächt und verängstigt. Er flüstert:{/n} "Sie ist hier. Adeline ist zurückgekehrt. Sie bittet mich um Hilfe. Ihr jedoch ... Ihr macht ihr Angst. Sie versteckt sich vor Euch. Ihr werdet Ihr doch nichts tun, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}An unpleasant heaviness grows in your head, as if a vice were slowly tightening its grip on your mind. The Choirmaster is kneeling, his burnt-out eyes peering into the void. He raises his head, and you see a weary old man, weak and frightened. He whispers,{/n} "She is here. Adeline has returned. She is asking me for help. But you... You scare her. She is hiding from you. You will not harm her, will you?"

Der Chormeister kniet auf dem Boden. Seine ausgebrannten Augen blicken in die Leere. Er hebt den Kopf, und du siehst einen erschöpften alten Mann, geschwächt und verängstigt. Er flüstert:{/n} "Sie ist hier. Adeline ist zurückgekehrt. Sie bittet mich um Hilfe. Ihr jedoch ... Ihr macht ihr Angst. Sie versteckt sich vor Euch. Ihr werdet Ihr doch nichts tun, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: {n}Vous avez la tête de plus en plus lourde, comme si un étau resserrait lentement son étreinte sur votre esprit. À genoux, le maître de chœur fixe le vide de ses yeux brûlés. Quand il relève enfin la tête, vous avez devant vous un vieil homme faible, abattu et effrayé. Il murmure :{/n} « Elle est ici. Adeline est de retour. Elle a besoin de mon aide, mais vous... vous lui faites peur et elle hésite à se montrer en votre présence. Promettez-moi que vous ne lui ferez pas de mal. »
languages.original_text: {n}An unpleasant heaviness grows in your head, as if a vice were slowly tightening its grip on your mind. The Choirmaster is kneeling, his burnt-out eyes peering into the void. He raises his head, and you see a weary old man, weak and frightened. He whispers,{/n} "She is here. Adeline has returned. She is asking me for help. But you... You scare her. She is hiding from you. You will not harm her, will you?"

Quand il relève enfin la tête, vous avez devant vous un vieil homme faible, abattu et effrayé. Il murmure :{/n} « Elle est ici. Adeline est de retour. Elle a besoin de mon aide, mais vous... vous lui faites peur et elle hésite à se montrer en votre présence. Promettez-moi que vous ne lui ferez pas de mal. »

languages.text: {n}Sanki bir kıskaç, zihnini yavaş yavaş sıkıştırıyormuş misali beynine huzursuz edici bir ağırlık çökmeye başlıyor. Koro Şefi diz çöküyor. Kora dönen gözlerini uçsuzun derinliklerine dikiyor. Başını kaldırmasıyla bitkin düşmüş, zayıf ve korku dolu ihtiyar bir adam görüyorsun. Fısıldayarak konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "O burada. Adeline geri döndü. Benden yardım istiyor ama siz... Onu korkutuyorsunuz. Sizden saklanıyor. Ona zarar vermeyeceksiniz, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}An unpleasant heaviness grows in your head, as if a vice were slowly tightening its grip on your mind. The Choirmaster is kneeling, his burnt-out eyes peering into the void. He raises his head, and you see a weary old man, weak and frightened. He whispers,{/n} "She is here. Adeline has returned. She is asking me for help. But you... You scare her. She is hiding from you. You will not harm her, will you?"
